title: Le Tresor des Cinq Epices
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Chinese, Take-out, Asian Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Treasury of Five Spices is an Asian fusion restaurant, one of the only restaurants in the city with more than one or two vegan options. Offers around 10 vegan items including appetizers, main dishes, veg sushi, and sorbet. Pleasant zen ambiance. Menu is in French but owners speak English. Walking distance from Bulle train station.
